contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Incorporation''' may refer to: * [[Incorporation (business)]], the creation of a corporation * [[Incorporation (association)]], giving legal form to an association by registering it as a corporation * Incorporation of a place, creation of [[municipal corporation]] such as a city or county * [[Incorporation of the Bill of Rights]], extension of parts of the United States Bill of Rights to bind individual American states. * [[Incorporation of international law]], giving domestic legal force to a sovereign state's international legal obligations * [[Incorporation (linguistics)]] == See also == * [[Incorporation by reference]] * [[Incorporated (disambiguation)]] * [[Corporation]] {{disambig}}
